name: HEARTH (Remi_Yanwen)
description:
On this planet, we share mEtal, plAnt, wateR, dirT, and Heat (EARTH). The earth is our heart and the only heart.

To play this game, you can press the left-arrow and right-arrow keys (or "A" & "D" keys) to control the rotation of the earth, make sure you match the right color and avoid the wrong color based on the Five Element Theory. This game has three levels, try it! I hope you can complete all those levels!

I created this game using the Five Element Theory from ancient China. Software I used Photoshop, Unity, Songmaker, and Premiere. HEARTH is an original game. Concept design, art, audio and sound effects, and the programming are original, created by me, an MS student in Viz @TAMU.

Thank you for playing or trying to play the game!

Leave me comments, please!
